Text:
A new Motorhead live show bluray is to be released on November 21. I'd like you, mate, to upload this in bluray format please. :) 
Thanks!


More details about the release in the following link

http://www.classicrockmagazine.com/news/motorhead-new-live-release/


There's also a new Rush live show bluray that should be released in November, so please upload it as well. thanks! 

http://www.classicrockmagazine.com/news/rush-announce-three-live-releases/

Hej på dig

Kan du försöka fixa Bruce Springsteens Performance???

Tack på förhand Roffe
